faq.subtitle: Find answers to the most commonly asked questions about our AI-powered ECG analysis platform.

items.question: How accurate is ECG Buddy's analysis?
items.answer: ECG Buddy achieves 99.2% accuracy in ECG interpretation, validated through extensive clinical trials and real-world deployment in over 500 healthcare facilities.

items.question: Is ECG Buddy approved for clinical use?
items.answer: Yes, ECG Buddy has received approval from Korea's Ministry of Food and Drug Safety (MFDS) and is certified for clinical use in healthcare settings.

items.question: What ECG formats does ECG Buddy support?
items.answer: ECG Buddy supports multiple formats including 12-lead, 6-lead, and single-lead ECGs, with compatibility for standard industry formats like DICOM and SCP-ECG.

items.question: How does ECG Buddy integrate with existing systems?
items.answer: ECG Buddy offers seamless integration through APIs and direct EMR connectivity, supporting HL7 FHIR standards for interoperability with hospital systems.

items.question: What security measures protect patient data?
items.answer: ECG Buddy employs enterprise-grade security including end-to-end encryption, HIPAA compliance, and SOC 2 Type II certification to ensure patient data protection.
